parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The maximum number of entries per page.

Valid values: 1 to 50.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description:
The name of the Cloud Assistant plug-in. The name supports all character sets and must be 1 to 255 characters in length.

*   If this parameter is not specified, the status of all Cloud Assistant plug-ins that are installed on the specified instances are queried.

    **

    **Note** If this parameter is not specified, only a single instance ID can be specified.

*   If this parameter is specified, the status of the specified Cloud Assistant plug-in is queried.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of NextToken.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: >  This parameter will be removed in the future. We recommend that you use NextToken and MaxResults for a paged query.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: >  This parameter will be removed in the future. We recommend that you use NextToken and MaxResults for a paged query.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
